text: Final #healthcare tweet of the night: The battle is far from finished. Senate has yet to vote on a reform bill.
author: jackgraycnn

text: Speaker Nancy Pelosi, beaming, gavels the vote into the record. Applause and cheers in the chamber.
author: jackgraycnn

text: The vote, now official: #healthcare reform bill has passed the U.S. House 220 to 215.
author: jackgraycnn

text: So far only one Republican vote in favor of the bill, Congressman Joseph Cao of Louisiana.
author: jackgraycnn

text: Technically the vote still has 4 minutes to go, so it's not yet official.  But Dems do have the needed 218 votes for passage.
author: jackgraycnn

text: Health care reform bill has just passed the U.S. House.  Supporters break into applause.
author: jackgraycnn

text: 7 minutes left in the final vote on #healthcare reform. Democrats need 218 to pass.  As of right now they have 216.
author: jackgraycnn

text: Final vote on U.S. House #healthcare bill expected shortly. CNN's fantastic Saturday night team & political unit have it covered.
